mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ef.EMAIL_SN) FROM EMAIL_FROM ef left join EMAIL_TO ET on ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE = ET.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE left join EMAIL_CC EC on ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE = EC.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE WHERE ef.EMAIL_SN = #{emailSn} and (et.EMAIL_TO_ADDR = #{nowEmailAddr} or ec.EMAIL_CC_ADDR = #{nowEmailAddr})

SELECT ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE , ef.EMAIL_SN , ef.EMAIL_FROM_ADDR , ef.EMAIL_FROM_SJ , ef.EMAIL_FROM_SEND_DATE , et.EMAIL_TO_ADDR , ers.EMAIL_DELETE_AT , ers.EMAIL_IMPRTNC_AT , ers.EMAIL_REDNG_AT FROM EMAIL_FROM ef left JOIN EMAIL_TO et on ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE = et.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE left join EMAIL_RECEIVED_STTUS ers on ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE = ers.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE where ef.EMAIL_FROM_ADDR not in #{emailAddr} and et.EMAIL_TO_ADDR in #{emailAddr} order by ef.EMAIL_SN desc

SELECT ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE , ef.EMAIL_SN , ef.EMAIL_FROM_ADDR , ef.EMAIL_FROM_SJ , ef.EMAIL_FROM_SEND_DATE , ec.EMAIL_CC_ADDR , ers.EMAIL_DELETE_AT , ers.EMAIL_IMPRTNC_AT , ers.EMAIL_REDNG_AT FROM EMAIL_FROM ef left JOIN EMAIL_CC ec on ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE = ec.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE left join EMAIL_RECEIVED_STTUS ers on ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE = ers.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE where ef.EMAIL_FROM_ADDR not in #{emailAddr} and ec.EMAIL_CC_ADDR in #{emailAddr} order by ef.EMAIL_SN desc

SELECT ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE , ef.EMAIL_SN , ef.EMAIL_FROM_ADDR , ef.EMAIL_FROM_SJ , ef.EMAIL_FROM_SEND_DATE , et.EMAIL_TO_ADDR , ers.EMAIL_DELETE_AT , ers.EMAIL_IMPRTNC_AT , ers.EMAIL_REDNG_AT FROM EMAIL_FROM ef left JOIN EMAIL_TO et on ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE = et.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE left join EMAIL_RECEIVED_STTUS ers on ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE = ers.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE where ef.EMAIL_FROM_ADDR = #{emailAddr} and ef.EMAIL_FROM_ADDR = et.EMAIL_TO_ADDR order by ef.EMAIL_SN desc

select ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE , ef.EMAIL_SN , ef.EMAIL_FROM_ADDR , ef.EMAIL_FROM_SJ , ef.EMAIL_FROM_SEND_DATE , et.EMAIL_TO_ADDR , ers.EMAIL_IMPRTNC_AT , ers.EMAIL_DELETE_AT from EMAIL_FROM ef left join EMAIL_TO ET on ef.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE = ET.EMAIL_ETPR_CODE left join EMAIL_RECEIVED_STTUS ERS on ef.EMAIL_FROM_ADDR = ERS.EMAIL_FROM_ADDR where ef.EMAIL_FROM_ADDR = 'groovytest@daum.net' and et.EMAIL_TO_ADDR not in 'groovytest@daum.net' order by ef.EMAIL_SN desc
